longDescription.description: A longer, more thematic description of the spell that can be used in-game to add lore and flavor

castSlot.description: The slot the spell is cast in

castTime.description: The time it takes to cast the spell

cooldown.description: The time it takes to cool down after casting the spell

magic.description: The family of magic the spell belongs to

spellTier.description: The tier of the spell, used to indicate how soon it can be unlocked or learned. One of the tier 0 spells will be a free choice when learning a type of magic.

speed.description: The speed of the spell, used to determine how quickly it travels

range.description: The range of the spell, used to determine how far it can travel

duration.description: The duration of the spell, used to determine how long it lasts

damage.description: The damage of the spell, used to determine how much damage it does

healing.description: The healing of the spell, used to determine how much healing it does

radius.description: The radius of the spell, used to determine how large the area of effect is

angle.description: The angle of the spell, used to determine how wide the area of effect is

collider.description: The collider of the spell, used to determine how it interacts with the world

debuffs.description: The debuffs applied by the spell

buffs.description: The buffs applied by the spell

castType.description: The type of cast the spell uses

castCategory.description: The broad category of the spell

iconTileset.description: The tileset with the icon of the spell (path in the assets folder)

iconIndex.description: The index of the icon in the tileset

spriteTileset.description: The sprite of the spell (path in the assets folder)

spriteIndex.description: The index of the sprite in the tileset
